about_the_game:
The world can be a scary place, ruled by powerful but uncaring kings, and populated by over-ambitious businessmen, dutiful knights, and many other strange beings beyond any comprehension. There is a bitter class struggle between Spidz and Bears, a conflict manipulated by well-connected individuals from both sides with obscure interests. And between them all, a little teddy bear is out there searching for his place, for a meaning to his life – and as scary as his search is, nothing will stop him, for he is Brave Eduardo!



Brave Eduardo is a 2D open-world RPG, set in a creepy Victorian world where the poor shiver under the cold, miserable rain, while the rich feast in their golden halls. Under a veneer of normality, a strange world lurks – the shadows are full of horrors and mechanical monsters; but a brave little toy can make a difference with his bravery, wits, and skills.



Explore a vast hand-drawn world, full of bustling towns and quirky magical biomes – a world for you to live in, cooking, trading, and gathering resources. Fight epic battles with a thrilling, smooth combat system. Venture into procedurally generated dungeons and face over 50 bosses, each with unique mechanics and characteristics – including some steam-powered mechanical colossus! Meet new friends in your adventures and stand up to those who will want to put an end to your journey – just bear in mind that not everybody is as they seem!



Brave Eduardo was inspired by a popular Internet legend: how teddy bears protect their children in their sleep, fencing off monsters and all kinds of evil forces that seek to destroy their innocence – even after falling forgotten under their owners’ bed. Inspired by this memory from their own childhoods, indie studio DotDream created the character of Eduardo – a little teddy bear that, despite looking defenseless, is brave enough to stand against overwhelming odds to defend what he believes in.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Explore a vast 2D hand-drawn open world; a world that is alive, with over 10 biomes, varying weather, wildlife, and interesting inhabitants. A riveting tale awaits!
  • Fight thrilling hack-and-slash battles with precise, smooth controls
  • Choose and set the order of 50+ cards for an explosive amount of combos for a deep combat system!
  • Cook over 100 recipes to get power-ups
  • Meet and talk to NPCs from different backgrounds – just remember some Bears or Spidz aren’t what they seem…
  • Play with a helpful Owl in local co-op
  • 1 large continent and two islands, with many quests, for more than 30 hours of gameplay!
  • Enjoy a fantastic original soundtrack, recorded live by a full orchestra

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 12.04 or later, or otherwise compatible Linux distribution
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Brave Eduardo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 5 years or younger. Integrated graphics and very low budget cards may not work. Shader Model 3.0 required
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You are Eduardo, a teddy bear thrust into a racial struggle between Bears and Spidz who share the same land. On Eduardo's journey to discover his purpose, he must learn to master ability cards and curry cooking to uncover the hidden root of all evil in this Victorian-inspired fantastical world.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
